turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I'm a new patient.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help you with that. Let me pull up Dr. Ramirez's availability for new patients. Do you have a preferred date or time of day?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Preferably sometime in the afternoon, next week. I'm pretty flexible, though. Honestly, I've been putting this off for too long.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, checking... I see an opening next Tuesday at 2:30 PM and another on Thursday at 3:00 PM. Would either of those work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tuesday at 2:30 works. Now, about insuranceâ€¦will you need my insurance information at the time of scheduling, or when I arrive? And which insurance providers does Dr. Ramirez accept?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: We can take your insurance information now to speed things up, or you can provide it at the appointment. Dr. Ramirez accepts most major insurance plans, including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, and UnitedHealthcare. Can you confirm which provider you're with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, good, I have Blue Cross Blue Shield. Let's do it now then. My member ID is BX123456789. Is there anything else I need to know before the appointment? Like, where should I park?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Great! I've added your insurance information. For parking, there's a parking garage attached to the building; we validate tickets. Please arrive 15 minutes early to fill out some paperwork. See you Tuesday!
